statements: SELECT * FROM auditing_activities;
SELECT event_description, event_timestamp FROM auditing_activities WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_description, user_role FROM auditing_activities WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT event_description, event_timestamp FROM auditing_activities WHERE user_id = 50 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_description, user_role FROM auditing_activities WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM auditing_activities WHERE user_id = 123 AND event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, event_description FROM auditing_activities WHERE user_role = 'Admin' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_description, user_role FROM auditing_activities WHERE event_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM auditing_activities WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND user_role <> 'Guest' ORDER BY user_id, event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events, user_role FROM auditing_activities GROUP BY user_role HAVING total_events > 10 ORDER BY total_events DESC,user_role;
SELECT * FROM audit_log ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, event_description FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT event_type, event_time FROM audit_log WHERE event_type = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY event_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT event_description, event_time FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY event_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM audit_log WHERE event_type = 'LOGIN';
SELECT user_id, AVG(id) AS avg_id FROM audit_log GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT event_time, event_description FROM audit_log WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM users WHERE id < 10) ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM auditing_events;
SELECT event_description, event_timestamp FROM auditing_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_description FROM auditing_events WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT event_description, alert_description FROM auditing_events INNER JOIN security_alerts ON auditing_events.event_id = security_alerts.event_id;
SELECT * FROM auditing_events WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_description, event_timestamp FROM auditing_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_activities WHERE activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT a.user_id, u.activity_description FROM user_activities u JOIN auditing_events a ON u.user_id = a.event_id ORDER BY u.user_id ASC;

SELECT s.alert_description, u.user_id, a.event_description FROM security_alerts s JOIN user_activities u ON s.user_id = u.user_id JOIN auditing_events a ON s.event_id = a.event_id WHERE a.event_timestamp < NOW();
SELECT * FROM auditing_activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_id, event_type, timestamp FROM auditing_activities WHERE event_type = 'Login';
SELECT username, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Update' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT admin_id, admin_name, details FROM admin_activity WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_type, timestamp, message FROM system_logs WHERE log_type LIKE '%Error%' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM auditing_activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login';
SELECT admin_name, details FROM admin_activity WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_type, message FROM system_logs WHERE log_type LIKE 'error%' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT event_type, description FROM auditing_activities UNION SELECT activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity;
SELECT * FROM audit_events WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT event_description, event_timestamp FROM audit_events WHERE event_type = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'SIGNUP' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE session_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM session_logs WHERE session_id = 100 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp FROM audit_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Login' AND activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, session_start, session_end FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY session_start ASC
SELECT user_id, login_timestamp, login_status FROM login_attempts WHERE login_status = 'Failed' AND login_ip = '192.168.0.1'
SELECT * FROM session_logs WHERE session_id = 456 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
